title: Listener Mail
description: This episode was recorded Friday (check back for a new episode early Sunday night) with host/congressional correspondent Susan Davis, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and congressional correspondent Ailsa Chang. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
